cu.explanation_en: Setting the DRB ciphering to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause configuration parsing errors and prevent proper security setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting the maximum MIMO layers to an out-of-range value of 16 will cause hardware configuration failure and prevent cell initialization.
du.explanation_zh: 將最大 MIMO 層數設定為超出範圍的值 16，會導致硬體配置失敗，並阻止細胞初始化。
